ygData.subject: RE: problem with leering corpse
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, the bug is related to the levetate spell, a person in my group was getting killed and we couldnt even find out where she was. belphenor
ygData.messageBody:
yes, the bug is related to the levetate spell, a person in my group was
getting killed and we couldnt even find out where she was.

belphenor



>From: "Saiveau, Jim" <Jim.Saiveau@...>
>
>This seems to be a very buggy patch. Last night I was hunting at the Aviak
>Village (also on Karana Server), and suddenly a wizard was trying to steal
>my kill. Once he started casting on it I looked around for him and saw
>flashes in the distance. He hit the bird enough times for it to charge
>after
>him, so I followed the bird to his position. When I got there all I saw was
>the colorful effects of someone weaving a spell, but he was invis! The bird
>was also trying to swat something that was there, but it never seemed to
>connect. I was standing right in front of him watching this. I tried to
>target him - nothing. I tried to See Invis - nothing. No message at the
>bottom saying "XXXXX casts a spell." Anyone seen this bug? I lost the kill
>and didn't even have someone to bitch at for it....
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kent Anderson [mailto:wart1@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 4:49 PM
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] problem with leering corpse
>
>
>From: Kent Anderson <wart1@....>
>
>Logged on today after last patch, used 40 bone chips and not one pet hit
>over 10dmg. Yes it was leering corpse I was using. I'm level 15 on the
>karana server. I tried rememming the spell and I even cast the previous
>pet spell. So my question is have necros' been screwed again, is it a
>bug on all servers, a bug on Karana, or is my Char bugged? Any help
>would be appreciated before I close the account and tell Verant where to
>stick it.
>
>Slortar,
>Karana
>
>
